Pages Configuration

Generic Front Matter

---
layout: default
title: Page Title Goes Here
---

Theme Specific Front Matter

---
excerpt: Short description to include as an opening and SEO metatags.
nav_order: 4
nav_exclude: false
canonical_url: https://www.google.com
search_exclude: false
---
